item.title: First 'tooth regrowth' medicine moves toward clinical trials in Japan
item.description: - A Japanese research team is developing a groundbreaking medication that may allow people to grow new teeth, with clinical trials set to begin in July 2024.

item.title: JavaScript Gom Jabbar
item.description: - The post discusses the challenges and pain points of working with JavaScript, specifically in relation to package.json files and various dependencies and tools.

item.title: Stanford A.I. Courses
item.description: - Stanford University has added video introductions to some of their Artificial Intelligence (A.I.)

item.title: Alt-F4 #65 â€“ Factorio visualizer in Unreal Engine 5
item.description: - The FUE5 project is an experimental project that visualizes the 2D world of the game Factorio in a 3D environment using Unreal Engine 5.

item.title: AMD CPU Use Among Linux Gamers Approaching 70% Marketshare
item.description: - The market share of AMD CPUs among Linux gamers is approaching 70% according to the latest Steam Survey results for June.

item.title: After September 1, 2023, all Gfycat content & data will be deleted
item.description: - The Gfycat service, which allows users to search and share GIFs, will be discontinued after September 1, 2023.

item.title: Flattening ASTs & other compiler data structures
item.description: - Flattening abstract syntax trees (ASTs) is a technique that can improve performance and memory efficiency in language implementations and compilers.

item.title: Drastic increase in Tor clients from Germany
item.description: - The number of Tor clients in Germany has significantly increased.

item.title: Make Your Renders Unnecessarily Complicated by Modeling a Film Camera in Blender [video]
item.description: - The post provides a video tutorial on how to model a film camera in Blender, a software used for creating 3D computer graphics and animations.

item.title: Illegal Life Pro Tip: Want to ruin your competitor's business?
item.description: - The post discusses an illegal life pro tip on how to ruin your competitor's business by paying scammers to use stolen credit cards on their payment processor.
